description:
The Holocaust Museum & Education Center of Southwest Florida provides programs to the residents of and visitors to Collier County. With Holocaust studies being mandated in the State of Florida, the Museum provides age-appropriate programs for students at all grade levels in a five-county area. Through the Museum's guided and audio tours, and public education programs, the general public is engaged with history in a personal way.

###COL###
name: THE HOLOCAUST MUSEUM AND EDUCATION CENTER OF SOUTHWEST FLORIDA
